channel.title: Significant Battles or Wars Before 1000
channel.description: RSS feed of significant battles or wars before the year 1000.

item.title: Battle of Chappar Chiri
item.description: The Battle of Chappar Chiri, also called Battle of Sirhind, was fought between Mughal Empire and the Sikhs on 12 May 1710 at Chappar Chiri, located 20 kilometers from Sirhind.
